name: FOREST OF THE DEAD
description:
In FOREST OF THE DEAD you must survive huge waves of undead. You are stranded in the middle of the forest. No help, no hope.
Your only chance is to defend yourself with the available weapons against the approaching find and stay alive as long as possible.

Use the environment to your advantage
From submachine guns to rocket launchers, use a wide arsenal of deadly weapons.
Show no mercy to the ever-increasing waves of enemies.
